title: Question about obtaining better connection
body:
Hello! I have a question about possibly getting a better ping as after the server change it has not been better than a constant 75ms. The game is playable sure but not ideal. 

What can I do?

My company is called Wave. I am east Bay Area California. My speed i pay for is 110mbps.

Anything I can do?

replies.body: Are you having lag spikes or input delays as a result of this ping?  You can tune up your network in case of any local issues by going over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Hope that helps!
